description: Extend your GitLab workflows with additional utilities to enhance productivity and automation. Seamlessly integrate GitLab data and operations into your applications using this server. Simplify complex GitLab tasks with ready-to-use tools and resources.

gitlabPersonalAccessToken.description: GitLab personal access token for authentication

tools.name: get_upload_file
tools.description: Get the uploads which are uploaded files in a project that can be referenced as links in Markdown text in an issue, merge request, snippet, or wiki page (https://docs.gitlab.com/security/user_file_uploads/)

projectId.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project (https://docs.gitlab.com/api/rest/#namespaced-paths)

tools.name: upload_markdown_file
tools.description: Upload a file to GitLab project for use in Markdown content. Accepts file content as base64 data URL or plain text. Returns upload details including markdown link format.

fileName.description: Name of the file to upload (e.g., image.png, document.txt)

projectId.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project (https://docs.gitlab.com/api/rest/#namespaced-paths)

fileContent.description: File content as base64 data URL (data:image/png;base64,...) or plain text
